languages.text:
Imperial world characters gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against xenos or daemonic creatures. Their allies gain half the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Know No Heresy.
However, Imperial world characters' {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} and Lore (Warp) are always 0.
languages.original_text:
Персонаж с имперского мира получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} и +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против ксеносов и демонических существ. Союзники получают половину {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} от "Искоренения ереси".
При этом для персонажа с имперского мира {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g} и Знания: Варп всегда равны 0.

traits.locale_text:
Imperial world characters gain +10% critical hit chance and +10% armour against xenos or daemonic creatures. Their allies gain half the bonuses of know no heresy.
However, Imperial world characters' Lore (Xenos) and Lore (Warp) are always 0.

Imperial world characters gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against xenos or daemonic creatures. Their allies gain half the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Know No Heresy.
However, Imperial world characters' {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} and Lore (Warp) are always 0.

languages.text:
Charaktere einer imperialen Welt erhalten +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} und +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Xenos oder dämonische Kreaturen. Ihre Verbündeten erhalten die Hälfte der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} von Keine Häresie kennen.
{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g} und Wissen (Warp) von Charakteren einer imperialen Welt ist jedoch immer 0.
languages.original_text:
Imperial world characters gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against xenos or daemonic creatures. Their allies gain half the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Know No Heresy.
However, Imperial world characters' {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} and Lore (Warp) are always 0.

traits.locale_text:
Charaktere einer imperialen Welt erhalten +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritische Trefferchance{/g} und +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} gegen Xenos oder dämonische Kreaturen. Ihre Verbündeten erhalten die Hälfte der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} von Keine Häresie kennen.
{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Wissen (Warp){/g} von Charakteren einer imperialen Welt ist jedoch immer 0.

languages.text:
Les personnages des mondes impériaux bénéficient de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g} et de +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}contre les xénos ou les créatures démoniaques. Leurs alliés reçoivent la moitié des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'Absence d'Hérésie.
En revanche, les valeurs des compétences {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Connaissance (Warp){/g} des personnages des mondes impériaux sont toujours de 0.
languages.original_text:
Imperial world characters gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against xenos or daemonic creatures. Their allies gain half the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Know No Heresy.
However, Imperial world characters' {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} are always 0.

traits.locale_text:
Les personnages des mondes impériaux bénéficient de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g} et de +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g}contre les xénos ou les créatures démoniaques. Leurs alliés reçoivent la moitié des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'Absence d'Hérésie.
En revanche, les valeurs des compétences {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Connaissance (Warp){/g} des personnages des mondes impériaux sont toujours de 0.

languages.text:
帝国世界的角色在对抗异形与恶魔时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高10%。此角色的所有盟友获得“不识异形”效果{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}的一半。
然而，帝国世界的角色的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}异形知识{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}亚空间知识{/g}始终为0。
languages.original_text:
Imperial world characters gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against xenos or daemonic creatures. Their allies gain half the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Know No Heresy.
However, Imperial world characters' {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} are always 0.

traits.locale_text:
帝国世界的角色在对抗异形与恶魔时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击率{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}提高10%。此角色的所有盟友获得“不识异形”效果{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}的一半。
然而，帝国世界的角色的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}异形知识{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}亚空间知识{/g}始终为0。

languages.text:
Los personajes de mundos Imperiales ganan +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra xenos y criaturas daemónicas. Sus aliados reciben la mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} de No conocerás la herejía.
Sin embargo, las habilidades {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Conocimiento (disformidad){/g} de personajes de mundos Imperiales siempre son 0.
languages.original_text:
Imperial world characters gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against xenos or daemonic creatures. Their allies gain half the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} of Know No Heresy.
However, Imperial world characters' {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} are always 0.

traits.locale_text:
Los personajes de mundos Imperiales ganan +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} y +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} contra xenos y criaturas daemónicas. Sus aliados reciben la mitad de las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} de No conocerás la herejía.
Sin embargo, las habilidades {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Conocimiento (disformidad){/g} de personajes de mundos Imperiales siempre son 0.

languages.text:
インペリアルワールドのキャラクターは、異種族またはディーモン系の生物に対して{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+10%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+10%される。それらの味方は「異端を知らず」の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の半分を得る。
ただし、インペリアルワールドのキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}伝承（歪み）{/g}は常に0になる。

インペリアルワールドのキャラクターは、異種族またはディーモン系の生物に対して{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット率{/g}が+10%、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が+10%される。それらの味方は「異端を知らず」の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の半分を得る。
